hero.title: Your Path to Spiritual Clarity & Holistic Well-being
hero.subtitle: Experience the profound transformation of professional Reiki, Tarot, and Numerology services. Modern guidance for the soul.

reiki.title: Reiki Healing Services
reiki.description: Restore your body's natural energy flow and find deep relaxation with professional Reiki sessions. Our comprehensive healing services range from personalized one-on-one sessions and chakra balancing to specialized healing for pets and practitioner attunements.

areas.name: Personalized Healing
areas.desc: Individual and distance sessions designed to balance energy and restore inner harmony.

areas.name: Energy & Chakra Balancing
areas.desc: Alignment of the 7 main chakras and aura cleansing to remove emotional and physical blockages.

areas.name: Emotional Wellness
areas.desc: Targeted healing for stress, anxiety, and manifestation to align your vibration with your life goals.

tarot.title: Tarot Card Reading
tarot.description: Gain profound insights and spiritual guidance for your life's most pressing questions. Whether seeking clarity in relationships, career direction, or an overview of your past, present, and future, our intuitive deck-based readings provide the path forward.

areas.name: Life & Love Guidance
areas.desc: Deep intuitive sessions focused on personal situations, relationships, and emotional compatibility.

areas.name: Career & Success
areas.desc: Strategic spiritual guidance regarding professional growth, job opportunities, and business decisions.

areas.name: Insightful Roadmaps
areas.desc: Comprehensive Past-Present-Future spreads and quick Yes/No readings for immediate clarity.

numerology.title: Numerology Consultation
numerology.description: Unlock the vibrational secrets hidden within your numbers to align with your true destiny. From complete life path analysis and name correction to choosing auspicious names for babies and businesses, discover how numbers shape your success.

areas.name: Destiny Analysis
areas.desc: Complete analysis of birth dates and names to uncover life purpose, strengths, and challenges.

areas.name: Vibrational Correction
areas.desc: Name and brand alignment (Chaldean Method) to harmonize with lucky and successful frequencies.

areas.name: Daily Guidance
areas.desc: Personal luck recommendations for dates, colors, and analysis of mobile or vehicle numbers.

about.title: About Healings By Shilpi
about.p1: Welcome to Healings By Shilpi, a sacred space dedicated to your spiritual growth and holistic well-being. Founded by Shilpi, we specialize in Reiki healing, Tarot readings, and Numerology consultations.
about.p2: Our mission is to empower individuals to find clarity, balance, and harmony in their lives through these ancient and profound practices. Whether you are seeking physical healing, emotional support, or guidance on your life's path, we are here to support you.

contact.title: Connect With Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to discuss a custom package? Reach out via the form or through our direct channels. We are here to support your journey.
